plot: A young corporate speeds up to drop her grandmother at the seaside and to be back to work first thing tomorrow morning or she may lose her job. But her lovely grandma has another agenda.
title: Ela, panda si madam
plot_es: A young corporate speeds up to drop her grandmother at the seaside and to be back to work first thing tomorrow morning or she may lose her job. But her lovely grandma has another agenda.
plot_en: A young corporate speeds up to drop her grandmother at the seaside and to be back to work first thing tomorrow morning or she may lose her job. But her lovely grandma has another agenda.
